import React from 'react'; import Barra from './Barra'; import Footer from './Footer'; import './image-gallery.css'; import { FaCreditCard } from 'react-icons/fa'; import ImageGallery from 'react-image-gallery'; import {Container, Row, Col, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; class DetalleProducto extends React.Component{ render(){ const descripcion = "Zapatillas marca adidas fenomenales. Nuevas" const precio = "$ 150.000" const images = [ { original: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", thumbnail: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", }, { original: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", thumbnail: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", }, ]; return(

{descripcion}

{precio}
Paga en 12 Cuotas
Paga en 12 cuotas
) } } export default DetalleProducto
